籤詩版本二:
Ngathola umcebo ephusheni lami ngavuka ngingazi, ngangicabanga ukuthi uNanshan wayeyigeja nje.
Uma ubuza ngomshado nokugula, ungabheki izindlela zokusekelana.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele uphawu lokuthola ingcebo ephusheni.
Konke kuyize.
解曰: Izinto zisemanzini. Ukuma nobude bethunzi. Bonke bazimisele. Asikho isidingo sokuxoxa.
籤詩故事一:
◇U-Ma Chao ujaha u-Cao
UMa Chao (176-222), igama lokuhlonipha u-Mengqi, wayengowokuzalwa e-Fufeng Maoling (manje esenyakatho-mpumalanga ye-Xingping, eSifundazweni Sase-Shaanxi). Wayengujenene odumile woBukhosi Bakwa-Shu Han ngasekupheleni koBukhosi buka-Han kanye nesikhathi semibuso emithathu.
Ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu, uCao Cao wabulala uyise kaMa Chao. UMa Chao waziphindiselela wahlasela uCao Cao, kodwa uCao Cao wahlulwa wabaleka.
Ukuze angabonwa amasosha kaMa Chao, uCao Cao wakhumula ihembe lakhe elibomvu, wanquma intshebe yakhe yaba mfushane, wabaleka ngehhashi.
Esikhathini esibucayi, uCao Hong wafika namasosha akhe ngesikhathi, wamisa uMa Chao, futhi wasindisa impilo kaCao Cao esangweni lesihogo.
(Le ndaba isingathekiso sendlela umuntu angabalekela ngayo ingozi ngokulahla udumo nesimo sakhe.)
聖意: Uma umuzi wakho ungekho sesimweni esihle, qaphela ukufuna imali, ukuvimbela ukuthengiselana, ukwenza umshado ube nzima, ulinde isikhathi.Liujia uthandazela ukuvikeleka.Abahamba ngezinyawo baphuzile, izikelemu zimile, nezilwane zimile, abantu bafuna abantu. amacala, ukulahlekelwa izinhlanhla, ukulahleka kwempahla, izifo ezingenalutho, ukuthandazela isibusiso sikankulunkulu izintaba namathuna akukhululekile.
